goodChoiceIf: You are new to migraine tracking
examples: I want to know know what factors affect my migraines.
I want to know whether changing my diet is affecing my migraines.

goodChoiceIf: You know what factors affect your migraine and are willing to track frequently so you know when those factors are accumulating
examples: I want to know if I'm likely to get a migraine today.

goodChoiceIf: You just want to keep track of your migraines (or related data)
examples: I want to know how often I get migraines or use medication
I need to track for my insurance or doctor
